industry: Truck Transportation, Warehousing and Storage, and Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
Fundamental Duties And Responsibilities Include The Following

Receive items by unloading vehicles; accepting deliveries; unpacking containers

Verify items received by inspecting condition of items; comparing count/measure of items to purchase order and packing list; noting discrepancies

Document items received by recording identifying information

Transfer orders received by delivering items to correct holding area

Pull inventory for jobs

Process returns by organizing, completing paperwork and arranging for delivery

Prepare shipments by packing, protecting, and labeling containers

Ship items by verifying identifying information and quantity and condition of items; loading and protecting items

Document items shipped by recording identifying information of items and transport information

Maintain safe and clean work environment by keeping shelves, pallet area, and work yard neat; maintain clean shipping supply area; complying with procedures, rules, and regulations

Qualifications

Experience working in a manufacturing warehouse

Able to drive forklift

Able to work at a fast pace

Detail oriented and organized

Mechanically inclined

Good communication skills and able to follow instructions

Read and write English

Familiar with plumbing and electrical components a plus
